events.message: The insured filed a claim reporting a collision involving their car with a tree during a rainstorm causing significant front-end damage.
Claim categorised under Auto Accident cluster after review of submitted details and police report indicating a vehicular collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to guide the claimant through the vehicle damage claim process and next steps.
The claimant received written acknowledgment from the insurer confirming that the auto accident claim was officially received.
Request sent to claimant for additional documents including vehicle repair estimates, photos of damage, and the police accident report.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including mechanic's repair quotation, accident report, and vehicle photos for assessment.
The claims investigation team initiated a detailed review of the submitted accident evidence to verify fault and assess damage.
Investigation concluded that the reported collision was covered under the policy with damages consistent with claimant's account.
A settlement proposal was issued offering reimbursement for vehicle repairs totaling $4,500 as per the mechanic's estimate.
Claimant responded positively indicating satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and quick processing.
Claim officially approved by the insurance company after acceptance of settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment for the approved auto repair claim was transferred to claimantâ€™s account as per agreed settlement.
The claim case was formally closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair completion by the claimant.
